Package doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers

Class DoaRectRenderer

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.scene.DoaComponent
doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers.DoaRenderer
doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers.DoaRectRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DoaRectRenderer
extends DoaRenderer
Rectangle shape renderer.
Since:
DoaEngine 3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.awt.Color color
    The color in which the shape will be rendered.
    protected boolean fill
    When true, the shape will be filled, when false, the shape will only be drawn.
    protected java.awt.Rectangle rect
    The rectangle this renderer will render.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.awt.Color getColor()  
    DoaVector getDimensions()  
    boolean getFill()  
    DoaVector getOffset()  
    void render()
    Do not call this method. This method is called by DoaEngine when: This renderer is added to a DoaObject, The DoaObject this renderer is added to, is added to a DoaScene, The DoaScene the DoaObject this renderer is added to, is loaded. Use the appropriate functions in DoaGraphicsFunctions to draw onto the screen.
    void setColor​(@NotNull java.awt.Color color)  
    void setDimensions​(@NotNull DoaVector dimensions)
    Sets the dimensions of this rectangle.

  • Field Details

    • rect

      protected java.awt.Rectangle rect
      The rectangle this renderer will render.

    • color

      protected java.awt.Color color
      The color in which the shape will be rendered. Default value is Color.PINK.

    • fill

      protected boolean fill
      When true, the shape will be filled, when false, the shape will only be drawn.

  • Method Details

    • setOffset

      public void setOffset​(@NotNull @NotNull DoaVector offset)
      Sets the offset of the rectangle. The offset is calculated from the owner of this renderer's transform's position.
      Parameters:
      offset - offset of this renderer

    • setDimensions

      public void setDimensions​(@NotNull @NotNull DoaVector dimensions)
      Sets the dimensions of this rectangle.
      Parameters:
      dimensions - dimensions of rectangle

    • getColor

      public java.awt.Color getColor()

    • getFill

      public boolean getFill()

    • render

      public void render()
      Do not call this method. This method is called by DoaEngine when:
      1. This renderer is added to a DoaObject,
      2. The DoaObject this renderer is added to, is added to a DoaScene,
      3. The DoaScene the DoaObject this renderer is added to, is loaded.
      Use the appropriate functions in DoaGraphicsFunctions to draw onto the screen.
      Specified by:
      render in class DoaRenderer
